pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Quan2 guo2 Fu4 nu:3 Lian2 he2 hui4

definition: director of the local committee of the Women's Federation
Woman can hold up half the sky/fig. nowadays, women have an equal part to play in society
pinyin: fu4 nu:3 neng2 ding3 ban4 bian1 tian1

definition: Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women
pinyin: Xiao1 chu2 dui4 Fu4 nu:3 Yi1 qie4 Xing2 shi4 Qi2 shi4 Gong1 yue1
containing_words.word: 消除對婦女一切形式歧視公約

sentences.english: Florals are for middle-aged women with weight problems.
sentences.chinese: 大花圖案都是爲那些有體重問題的中年婦女所準備的。

sentences.english: Xiang Jingyu is the pioneer of Chinese women liberation.
sentences.chinese: 向警予是中國婦女解放事業的先驅。

sentences.english: They are too conscientious and responsible to drive like manias .
sentences.chinese: 婦女格外謹慎，責任心也強，不會像狂人一樣開飛車。

sentences.english: She is then serenaded by all the married women .
sentences.chinese: 然後由所有的已婚婦女爲新娘唱夜曲。

sentences.english: Liu is a more than 40-year-old middle-aged women.
sentences.chinese: 劉文是一位40多歲的中年婦女。

sentences.english: Haitian woman crosses a street of Port-au-Prince February 1, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 穿過海地太子港街道的婦女。

sentences.english: The robber grabbed the mobile phone away from the woman.
sentences.chinese: 搶劫犯把那名婦女的手機搶走了。
研究人員對9960名婦女進行了調查。

sentences.english: In this country the men plant the corn and the women later weed it.
sentences.chinese: 在這個國家，男人種植苞米然後由婦女爲苞米除草。

sentences.english: There’s an American woman who has had 47 orthopedics.
sentences.chinese: 有一位美國婦女做了47次整形手術。

sentences.english: They’re stirring up fights over a woman’s right to make her own health care choices.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲婦女健康選擇權益保護而攪和。

sentences.english: Radiological health protection standards for X-ray examinations of child-bearing age women and pregnant women.
sentences.chinese: 育齡婦女和孕婦的X線檢查放射衛生防護標準。

sentences.english: These are they who have not been defiled with women, for they are virgins.
sentences.chinese: 這些人未曾與婦女在一起受到玷污，他們原是童身。

sentences.english: The door opened and in came a woman with a baby in her arms.
sentences.chinese: 門開了，走進一位婦女，懷裏抱着個孩子。

sentences.english: Many of those seeking admittance are women.
sentences.chinese: 那些尋求准入許多是婦女。

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
